Combo.Name: Shadow Scour
Effects: Deals bonus damage to bloodied or blinded foes.

Actions.Name: Dark Arts
Actions.Description: Swap places with a character in range, teleporting. Foes can save to avoid this effect.

Actions.Name: Smothering Darkness
Actions.Description: The [name] creates a darkness terrain effect in a single space in range. The area is dangerous terrain for foes, and foes inside are blinded+.
